response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I understand its true worth to be $12,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500, aiming to provide you with an opportunity to experience its benefits while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I look forward to hearing your response.", "product_price": 9500}
